hero.title: From Reactive Claims to Proactive Protection.
hero.subtitle: A satellite-based Early Warning System (EWS) that gives your portfolio a 12-hour head start against climate hazards.

challenge.title: The Climate Paradigm Shift
challenge.subtitle: Traditional risk models are reactive. Waiting for the claim to happen is no longer a viable strategy.

points.title: Increasing Volatility
points.description: Climate volatility in Latin America is increasing the frequency and severity of extreme events like hail and flash floods.

points.title: Direct Impact
points.description: Storms and strong winds generate thousands of claims annually, directly impacting your combined ratio.

points.title: The Need for Action
points.description: The industry needs a paradigm shift towards active prevention and customer communication.

solution.title: The Proactive Advantage
solution.subtitle: Our EWS protects your policyholders and reduces claims through three key pillars.

steps.title: Anticipation
steps.description: Alerts issued with at least 12 hours of lead time before the event impacts the asset.

steps.title: Precision
steps.description: Identification of risks at a local level with hourly updates and precise geographic detail.

steps.title: Action
steps.description: Enables preventive communication (SMS/App) to policyholders to mitigate damage before it occurs.

tech.title: Exponential Reliability: The 'Ensemble' Approach
tech.subtitle: We don't rely on a single forecast. We aggregate the world's best models to eliminate uncertainty.
tech.description: Every 6 hours, we combine over 200 unique forecasts, including multiple 'members' of the most advanced ensemble models (EPS). This allows us to quantify probability with superior statistical confidence.

integration.title: Seamless API Integration
integration.subtitle: Automate risk management directly into your CRM and policy administration systems.

trust.title: Trusted by Industry Leaders
trust.text: In Argentina, Allianz relies on the EcoClimaSol Early Warning System to protect its customers and proactively manage climate risks.
